title: (New) iPhone - Embedded playback of Videos
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team
custom_steps: When user is on Team Page and Video Autoplays
custom_expected: Then the video should autoplay without any issue

title: (New) iPhone - Top 5 Videos Load
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team
custom_steps: When the Videos module of the Team page loads
custom_expected: Then the user will see the top 5 videos from the team's video index in a 5 card carousel

title: (New) iPhone - Rest of Videos Load
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And the Videos module of the Team page loads

And sees the top 5 videos from the team's video index in a 5 card carousel
custom_steps: When the user swipes left/right on the Videos module
custom_expected: Then the user should see the rest of the videos in the carousel

title: (New) iPhone Video User Scrolls Past First 5 Videos
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And Video playback begins in autoplay
custom_steps: When the user vertically scrolls past the video without any interaction and then returns
custom_expected: Then the video is 50% in view, the video should resume from the beginning

title: (New) iPad - Embedded playback of Videos
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPad with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team
custom_steps: When user is on Team Page and Video Autoplays
custom_expected: Then the video should autoplay without any issue

title: (New) iPad - Top 5 Videos Load
custom_preconds:
Given a user with MLB App installed on an iPad 

And the User has a favorite team set
custom_steps: When the user loads the Videos module of the Team page
custom_expected: Then the user will see the top 5 videos from the team's video index in a 5 card carousel

title: (New) iPad - Rest of Videos Load
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And the Videos module of the Team page loads

And sees the top 5 videos from the team's video index in a 5 card carousel
custom_steps: When the user swipes left/right on the Videos module
custom_expected: Then the user should see the rest of the videos in the carousel

title: (New) iPad - Embedded playback of Videos and User Rotates Device
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And Video playback begins in autoplay
custom_steps: When the user rotates the device
custom_expected: Then the embedded playback of videos should play in full screen when the device is rotated to landscape and the embedded video is playing.

title: (New) iPad Video Auto Roll
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And Video playback begins in autoplay
custom_steps: When the video completes autoplay without any user interaction
custom_expected: Then the next video in the carousel should play

title: (New) iPad Video User Scrolls Past First 5 Videos
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB App installed

User set their favorite team

And Video playback begins in autoplay
custom_steps: When the user vertically scrolls past the video without any interaction and then returns
custom_expected: Then the video is 50% in view, the video should resume from the beginning

title: MLB.TV Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is logged into an MLB.tv account

AND

+ The user has navigated to a team page (From Home tab or More menu navigation)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the team scoreboard at the top of the team page

AND

+ There is a live game available to watch
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Tapping the MLB.tv button will send the user through the Games EPG launch flow

AND

+ The correct video stream will begin playback

OR

+ If the user is not entitled a paywall will display

OR

+ If the feed is blacked out a message will display

title: Audio Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is logged into an entitled audio-only or mlb.tv account

AND

+ The user navigates to a team page via Home tab or More Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the team page scoreboard for a team that has a live TV and Audio feed available

AND

+ The user taps the "Audio" button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will launch the Audio EPG flow

AND

+ The relative team's audio feed will begin playback
